entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning late this evening. Risk of freezing rain overnight. Rain over southern sections before morning. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 overnight. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rain over southern sections early in the morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near noon. Temperature falling to minus 8 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 15 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Wednesday 25 January 2023
